alert.note: Alert for Midland; Saginaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 5:42PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Saginaw and southeastern Midland Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 542 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Merrill, or 9 miles west of Freeland, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Freeland around 555 PM EDT. Zilwaukee around 620 PM EDT. Saginaw around 625 PM EDT. Bridgeport around 630 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Nelson, Carrollton, Garfield, Buena Vista Township, Poseyville, Indiantown, Laporte, Swan Creek, Shiawassee National Wildlife Refuge and Fosters. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
